    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int maxThreads
      Maximum Threads playing at once (if this is reached, and a new one is created, it will destroy the oldest one (the first one in the list).
      ArrayList<SoundHandler.SoundThread> threads
      An array of all sound threads

    • Field Detail

      • threads

        public ArrayList<SoundHandler.SoundThread> threads
        An array of all sound threads

      • maxThreads

        public int maxThreads
        Maximum Threads playing at once (if this is reached, and a new one is created, it will destroy the oldest one (the first one in the list).

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init()

      • setMaxThreads

        public SoundHandler setMaxThreads(int max)
        Sets the maximum amount of threads. Make sure to be careful of the dreaded OutOfMemory error that can occur if too many threads exist.
        Parameters:
        max -
        Returns:

      • playSound

        public void playSound(URI file,
                      int volume,
                      int repeatTime)
        Starts a thread to play a sound, provided in the passed file, at the specified volume for the specified amount of time.
        Parameters:
        file -
        volume -
        repeatTime - (1 = play once, and 0 = play until stopSound() is called).

      • stopSound

        public void stopSound(int index)
        Stops a sound from playing.
        Parameters:
        index - (the index in the "threads" array)

      • stopSound

        public void stopSound(SoundHandler.SoundThread thread)
        Stops a sound from playing
        Parameters:
        thread - (a copy of the thread to stop)

      • mute

        public void mute()
        Mutes the sound
